points.title: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis

case.title: Third parties are not allowed to access your personal information without a legal basis
case.localized_title: Le service ne permettra pas à des tiers d'accéder à vos informations personnelles sans base légale.

points.title: Usernames can be rejected for any reason

case.title: Usernames can be rejected or changed for any reason
case.localized_title: Les noms d'utilisateur peuvent être rejetés pour n'importe quelle raison
case.description: The service's terms explain they may change or remove usernames at their sole discretion, and they may do so without prior notice.

points.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.localized_title: Ce service utilise des cookies de tiers pour les statistiques
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

case.title: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
case.localized_title: Le service informe les utilisateurs que sa politique de confidentialité ne s'applique pas aux sites web de tiers
case.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.

points.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

case.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
case.localized_title: Vous acceptez de défendre, d'indemniser et de dégager le service de toute responsabilité en cas de réclamation liée à votre utilisation du service.

points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

case.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
case.localized_title: Le fournisseur de services ne garantit pas un service ininterrompu, opportun, sûr ou exempt d'erreurs.
case.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.

points.title: This service does not sell your personal data

case.title: Your personal data is not sold
case.localized_title: Ce service ne vend pas vos données personnelles
case.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.

points.title: This service requires first-party cookies

case.title: First-party cookies are used
case.localized_title: Ce service nécessite des cookies de première partie
case.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

points.title: The service collects many different types of personal data
points.analysis:
Full quote: "What kinds of information do we collect? To provide the Facebook Products, we must process information about you. The types of information we collect depend on how you use our Products. You can learn how to access and delete information we collect by visiting the Facebook Settings and Instagram Settings.

Things you and others do and provide

Information and content you provide.We collect the content, communications and other information you provide when you use our Products, including when you sign up for an account, create or share content, and message or communicate with others. This can include information in or about the content you provide (like metadata), such as the location of a photo or the date a file was created. It can also include what you see through features we provide, such as our camera, so we can do things like suggest masks and filters that you might like, or give you tips on using camera formats.

Our systems automatically process content and communications you and others provide to analyze context and what's in them for the purposes described below.

Learn more about how you can control who can see the things you share.

Data with special protections: You can choose to provide information in your Facebook profile fields or Life Events about your religious views, political views, who you are "interested in," or your health. This and other information (such as racial or ethnic origin, philosophical beliefs or trade union membership) could be subject to special protections under the laws of your country.

Networks and connections. We collect information about the people, Pages, accounts, hashtags and groups you are connected to and how you interact with them across our Products, such as people you communicate with the most or groups you are part of.

We also collect contact information if you choose to upload, sync or import it from a device (such as an address book or call log or SMS log history), which we use for things like helping you and others find people you may know and for the other purposes listed below.

Your usage. We collect information about how you use our Products, such as the types of content you view or engage with. the features you use. the actions you take. the people or accounts you interact with. and the time, frequency and duration of your activities. For example, we log when you're using and have last used our Products, and what posts, videos and other content you view on our Products. We also collect information about how you use features like our camera.

Information about transactions made on our Products. If you use our Products for purchases or other financial transactions (such as when you make a purchase in a game or make a donation), we collect information about the purchase or transaction. This includes payment information, such as your credit or debit card number and other card information. other account and authentication information. and billing, shipping and contact details.

Things others do and information they provide about you. We also receive and analyze content, communications and information that other people provide when they use our Products. This can include information about you, such as when others share or comment on a photo of you, send a message to you, or upload, sync or import your contact information."

case.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
case.localized_title: Le service recueille différents types de données à caractère personnel
case.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...

points.title: The service uses social media cookies/pixels

case.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
case.localized_title: Le service utilise des cookies/pixels de médias sociaux
case.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.

points.title: This service tracks you on other websites

case.title: This service tracks you on other websites
case.localized_title: Ce service vous suit sur d'autres sites web
case.description: The service may use tracking technologies in third-party websites to track your online activity while you aren't visiting their Site.

points.title: The service can read your private messages

case.title: Private messages can be read
case.localized_title: Le service peut lire vos messages privés
case.description: The Service is able to access, scan, review or read all user communications, including private messages, which may contain personal or sensitive data.

points.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

case.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des informations sur la manière dont il entend utiliser vos données à caractère personnel
case.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

points.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.localized_title: Ce service n'est accessible qu'aux utilisateurs ayant dépassé un certain âge.
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: Instagram shares information with many third parties
points.analysis: Instagram shares information with lots of third-parties, among them other instagram users (people and businesses), advertisers (only non-personally identifiable information, unless given permission), measurement partners (analytics), partners offering goods and services within instagram's products, vendors and service providers, researchers and academics as well as law enforcement.

case.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
case.localized_title: Instagram partage des informations avec de nombreux tiers

points.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Le service peut utiliser des pixels de suivi, des balises web, des empreintes de navigateur et/ou des empreintes d'appareil pour les utilisateurs.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

case.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez demander l'accès à vos données personnelles et leur suppression
case.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

case.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
case.localized_title: Ce service recueille des informations sur vous par l'intermédiaire de tiers
case.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

points.title: Your identity is used in ads that are shown to other users

case.title: Your identity is used in ads that are shown to other users
case.localized_title: Votre identité est utilisée dans les publicités diffusées à d'autres utilisateurs.
case.description:
Ads shown to other users may include a reference to you as an implied endorsement.
Might give away information about your own personal lifestyle to strangers.

points.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

case.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
case.localized_title: Le service peut vendre ou transférer d'une autre manière vos données personnelles dans le cadre d'une procédure de faillite ou d'un autre type de transaction financière.
case.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.

points.title: Very broad copyright license on your content
points.analysis: The copyright licence of Instagram has significantly changed in 2013. The license you grant them is now beyond the requirements for operating the service. For instance, it includes the right for Instagram to transfer the license or to license it to others on their terms (“sublicense”).

case.title: very broad
case.localized_title: Licence de droit d'auteur très large sur votre contenu

points.title: Instagram Court of law is California

case.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
case.localized_title: La Cour de justice d'Instagram est la Californie
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").

points.title: You waive your right to a class action
points.analysis: By agreeing to Instagram's terms, you agree that you can only bring any claim against them on your own behalf. You waive your right to being part of a class action, or participating in claims brought in any representative capacity.

case.title: You waive your right to a class action.
case.localized_title: Vous renoncez à votre droit à une action collective
case.description: The right to be represented in a class action (or representative action) exists in the US and some European countries. It allows people who have been similarly injured by the same accused to take legal action by a single lawsuit instead of individually. Some Terms of Service try to limit that right. By agreeing to them, you could waive (= renounce to) your right to a class action, which might reduce your chances to be successful in a case.

points.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.localized_title: le suivi via des cookies de tiers à d'autres fins sans votre consentement.
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: This service can delete your content if you violate the terms

case.title: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms
case.localized_title: Ce service peut supprimer votre contenu si vous ne respectez pas les conditions d'utilisation.
case.description: Content infringing the Terms of Service (or the Acceptable Use Policy or equivalent)  may be removed, with or without notice.

points.title: The service provides a free help desk

case.title: A free help desk is provided
case.localized_title: Le service propose un service d'assistance gratuit
case.description: The service can be easily contacted for questions or provides a support center at no extra cost.

points.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information

case.title: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
case.localized_title: Le service renvoie les utilisateurs à des documents externes pour plus d'informations.
case.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.

points.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

case.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
case.localized_title: Ce service peut utiliser vos informations personnelles à des fins de marketing
case.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.

points.title: Your biometric data is collected

case.title: Your biometric data is collected
case.localized_title: Vos données biométriques sont collectées
case.description: This service can collect or use your biometric data. This includes but is not limited to facial recognition, fingerprints, and iris scans. Although this feature can sometimes be convenient to the user, providing this type of information to the service could open your personal data to being sold or stolen.

points.title: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties

case.title: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties
case.localized_title: Vous ne pouvez pas distribuer ou divulguer votre compte à des tiers
case.description: In this context third-parties refers to anyone including friends, family, or company

points.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service

case.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez limiter la façon dont vos informations sont utilisées par des tiers et par le service
case.description: Usually it's related to the right to object to data processing or restrict it under the GDPR. Users may be able to refuse the use of their data for marketing purposes for instance.

points.title: You can choose with whom you share content

case.title: You can choose with whom you share content
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez choisir avec qui vous partagez votre contenu
case.description: Users can decide whether or not they want their content to be shared and they can control how and with whom it is shared.

points.title: This service keeps user logs for an undefined period of time

case.title: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time
case.localized_title: Ce service conserve les journaux des utilisateurs pendant une période indéfinie.
case.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that may keep logs indefinitely, allowing user sessions to be tracked over time. Logs that are kept for a time "consistent with applicable law" also fall under this case, since this period of time may be murky or undefined.

points.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

case.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service peut communiquer vos informations personnelles à des tiers
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

case.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
case.localized_title: Vous avez le droit de quitter ce service à tout moment
case.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

points.title: This service uses your personal information for many different purposes
points.analysis:
Full quote: "Here's how: Provide, personalize and improve our Products. We use the information we have to deliver our Products, including to personalize features and content (including your News Feed, Instagram Feed, Instagram Stories and ads) and make suggestions for you (such as groups or events you may be interested in or topics you may want to follow) on and off our Products. To create personalized Products that are unique and relevant to you, we use your connections, preferences, interests and activities based on the data we collect and learn from you and others (including any data with special protections you choose to provide). how you use and interact with our Products. and the people, places, or things you're connected to and interested in on and off our Products. Learn more about how we use information about you to personalize your Facebook and Instagram experience, including features, content and recommendations in Facebook Products. you can also learn more about how we choose the ads that you see.

Information across Facebook Products and devices:
We connect information about your activities on different Facebook Products and devices to provide a more tailored and consistent experience on all Facebook Products you use, wherever you use them.
For example, we can suggest that you join a group on Facebook that includes people you follow on Instagram or communicate with using Messenger. We can also make your experience more seamless, for example, by automatically filling in your registration information (such as your phone number) from one Facebook Product when you sign up for an account on a different Product
Location-related information: We use location-related information-such as your current location, where you live, the places you like to go, and the businesses and people you're near-to provide, personalize and improve our Products, including ads, for you and others. Location-related information can be based on things like precise device location (if you've allowed us to collect it), IP addresses, and information from your and others' use of Facebook Products (such as check-ins or events you attend).
Product research and development: We use the information we have to develop, test and improve our Products, including by conducting surveys and research, and testing and troubleshooting new products and features.[...]"

case.title: Your personal information is used for many different purposes
case.localized_title: Ce service utilise vos informations personnelles à différentes fins
case.description: Personal Data can be processed for many reasons, including non essential processing such as for advertising, marketing and analytics purposes.

points.title: They may stop providing the service at any time

case.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
case.localized_title: Ils peuvent cesser de fournir le service à tout moment
case.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.

points.title: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

case.title: This service holds onto content that you've deleted
case.localized_title: Ce service conserve le contenu que vous avez supprimé
case.description: Content may remain in backup servers and be retained after deletion, and thus never be completely deleted. This case doesn't apply to contributions that can't be removed due to the nature of the service.

points.title: They store data on you even if you did not interact with the service

case.title: They store data on you even if you did not interact with the service
case.localized_title: Ils stockent des données sur vous même si vous n'avez pas interagi avec le service.
case.description: Some services store data on you even if you did not provide that data yourself. For example, users might provide access to their address book, after which a service might also store the phone numbers of that person's contacts.

points.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

case.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
case.localized_title: Vos données peuvent être traitées et stockées partout dans le monde
case.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.

points.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

case.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs s'engagent à ne pas utiliser le service à des fins illégales
case.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.

points.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner

case.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner
case.localized_title: Si vous proposez des suggestions au service, celui-ci peut les utiliser sans votre accord ni compensation, mais il n'en devient pas propriétaire.
case.description: The service may employ a broad copyright license over feedback, proposals, ideas and suggestions submitted, including the right to use them without restriction, compensation or obligation to the user, but they do not claim ownership on them.

points.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

case.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
case.localized_title: Toute responsabilité au nom du service est limitée aux frais que vous avez payés en tant qu'utilisateur.

points.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
case.localized_title: Le service utilise vos données personnelles pour utiliser la publicité ciblée de tiers.
case.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.

points.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

case.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
case.localized_title: Le fait de ne pas appliquer une disposition des conditions d'utilisation ne constitue pas une renonciation à cette disposition.
case.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.

points.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents

case.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
case.localized_title: Ce service ne cautionne aucune idée contenue dans les contenus générés par les utilisateurs.

points.title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content

case.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
case.localized_title: Interdit l'affichage de contenu pornographique
case.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.

points.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

case.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers
case.localized_title: Le service n'est pas responsable des liens ou des contenus (clairement) cités par des fournisseurs de contenu tiers.

points.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

case.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des détails sur les types d'informations personnelles qu'il collecte
case.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

points.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

case.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs s'engagent à ne pas soumettre de contenu diffamatoire, harcelant ou menaçant
case.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.

points.title: Prohibits the posting of content which promotes or glorifies violence or politically or religiously extremist values.

case.title: You are prohibited from posting content which promotes violence or politically or religiously extremist values.
case.localized_title: Interdit la publication de contenus qui promeuvent ou glorifient la violence ou des valeurs politiquement ou religieusement extrémistes.
case.description: Users are not allowed to post extremist political or religious content. They are also not allowed to post content that glorifies violence.

points.title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

case.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
case.localized_title: Ce service interdit aux utilisateurs d'envoyer des chaînes de lettres, du courrier indésirable, du spam ou tout autre message non sollicité.
case.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.

points.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

case.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
case.localized_title: La nullité d'une partie des conditions d'utilisation n'entraîne pas la nullité de la partie restante
case.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.

points.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data

case.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
case.localized_title: Ce service vous permet de récupérer une archive de vos données
case.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

case.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
case.localized_title: Ce service oblige les utilisateurs à recourir à l'arbitrage obligatoire en cas de litige
case.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

case.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
case.localized_title: Le service est fourni "en l'état" et doit être utilisé aux seuls risques des utilisateurs.
case.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

points.title: Provides instructions on how to submit a copyright claim

case.title: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim
case.localized_title: Fournit des instructions sur la manière de soumettre une demande de droits d'auteur
case.description: If content that you own is copied or made accessible through the service in a way that constitutes an intellectual property right infringement, you can report it following the instructions given in the agreements.

points.title: You maintain ownership of your content

case.title: You maintain ownership of your content
case.localized_title: Vous restez propriétaire de votre contenu
case.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des accords.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: This service is a subsidiary of Facebook

case.title: This service is a subsidiary of Company X
case.localized_title: Ce service est une filiale de Facebook
case.description: The service is a subsidiary of a certain company (called X in the title, to be replaced by the parent Company in each point's title). Company X’s Terms of Service may apply to the service.

points.title: Your profile is combined across various products

case.title: Your profile is combined across various products
case.localized_title: Votre profil est combiné à différents produits
case.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.

points.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
points.analysis: Full quote: ''So, we need you to commit to a few restrictions in order to be part of the Instagram community. You must be at least 13 years old. You must not be prohibited from receiving any aspect of our Service under applicable laws or engaging in payments related Services if you are on an applicable denied party listing. We must not have previously disabled your account for violation of law or any of our policies.'

case.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs qui ont été bannis de façon permanente de ce service ne sont pas autorisés à se réinscrire sous un nouveau compte.
case.description: Once users have been permanently banned from this service, they are not allowed to create a new account to keep using the service.

points.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

case.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont regroupées dans des statistiques
case.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

case.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
case.localized_title: Le blocage des cookies de première partie peut limiter votre capacité à utiliser le service
case.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

points.title: Terms may be changed at their discretion, but they will notify you before.
points.analysis: They can change the terms at their discretion, but they will notify the user in reasonable advance by email or by posting them online. However, your use of the service constitutes acceptance of the changes in the terms without explicit consent.

case.title: When the service wants to change its terms, you are notified a week or more in advance.
case.localized_title: Les conditions peuvent être modifiées à leur discrétion, mais ils vous en informeront au préalable.
case.description: Users will be notified a week before the Terms are somehow updated, which lets them a reasonable amount of time to carefully read the changes and perhaps stop using the services if they do not longer agree.

points.title: This service collects your IP address for location use
points.analysis:
Full quote: "Data from device settings: information you allow us to receive through device settings you turn on, such as access to your GPS location, camera or photos.

Network and connections: information such as the name of your mobile operator or ISP, language, time zone, mobile phone number, IP address,[...]"

case.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
case.localized_title: Ce service recueille votre adresse IP à des fins de localisation.

points.title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online

case.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online
case.localized_title: Le service informe les utilisateurs des risques liés à la publication d'informations personnelles en ligne.

points.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

case.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
case.localized_title: Ce service peut collecter, utiliser et partager des données de localisation
case.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).

points.title: Users are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.
points.analysis:
While pseudonyms are allowed, impersonation and/or 'innacurate' information may result in a Guidelines breach.
Still, it's up for debate.

case.title: You are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs ne sont pas autorisés à utiliser des pseudonymes, car la confiance et la transparence entre les utilisateurs en ce qui concerne leur identité sont importantes pour le service.
case.description: You must provide your legal name and pseudonyms aren't allowed, but it makes sense for the purposes of this service.

points.title: defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination

case.title: Defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination
case.localized_title: défendre, indemniser, dégager de toute responsabilité ; survit à la résiliation

points.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements

case.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
case.localized_title: Ce service ne garantit pas que lui-même ou les produits obtenus par son intermédiaire répondent aux attentes ou aux exigences des utilisateurs
case.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

case.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
case.localized_title: Ce service n'assume aucune responsabilité pour les pertes ou les dommages résultant de toute question relative au service.
case.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.

points.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations
points.analysis: Full quote: "We store data until it is no longer necessary to provide our services and Facebook Products, or until your account is deleted - whichever comes first. This is a case-by-case determination that depends on things like the nature of the data, why it is collected and processed, and relevant legal or operational retention needs."

case.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
case.localized_title: Ce service peut conserver des données à caractère personnel après une demande d'effacement pour des raisons d'intérêt commercial ou d'obligations légales.
case.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)

points.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

case.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
case.localized_title: Le service ne répondra qu'aux demandes raisonnables du gouvernement
case.description: The Agreement explains they will disclose personal data about you if it is reasonably necessary to comply with applicable law and government requests.

points.title: Facebook collects a lot of device information through the Instagram App.
points.analysis:
Following the excerpt: "[...]IP address, connection speed and, in some cases, information about other devices that are nearby or on your network, so we can do things like help you stream a video from your phone to your TV.
Cookie data: data from cookies stored on your device, including cookie IDs and settings.[...]"

case.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions
case.localized_title: Facebook recueille de nombreuses informations sur les appareils par le biais de l'application Instagram.
case.description: The app of the service requires more device permissions than necessary. As a consequence it can compromise your privacy by accessing many functions and information from your device, such as precise location, contacts, device identifiers etc.

points.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

case.title: Your account can be suspended for several reasons
case.localized_title: Le service peut suspendre votre compte pour plusieurs raisons
